string.text: Better Exception Window will trigger when debugger is attached
Checking this will spawn console window.
Uncheck this options if you want to restore the old behaviour, Butterlib exception then followed by BEW window. Restart the game to take effect.
Enable Native code to Managed code exception handler
This will put exception handlers in Native code to Managed code procedures. Uncheck this if you're experiencing slowdowns in mission or battles.
Restart the game with debugger attached
Crash Test: Throw native code exception
Submit your thoughts and feedback about the current state of Better Exception Window via online survey forms. It takes less than a minute to complete.
